description:
小编导言：众人翘首期盼的《生活大爆炸》第九季终于要开播啦！9月21日，剧迷们一定要准时坐等资源哦！在还没等到回归的这一周，让我们先来看看本剧的趣闻轶事解解馋吧！

1. IT TOOK TWO PILOTS FOR THE SHOW TO GET PICKED UP TO SERIES.1. 试拍两次才得以播连续剧。

The first pilot began with a different theme song and featured Sheldon, Leonard, and two female characters, including a different actress playing what would become the Penny role. Chuck Lorre thought the initial pilot “sucked” but is open to having the unaired pilot included as part of a DVD.第一个试拍版本开篇的主题曲和现在的不同，以谢尔顿、莱纳德还有另外两个女性角色为主角，其中一个女演员的角色后来或将成为佩妮的角色。查克·罗瑞觉得第一个版本“一塌糊涂”， 但也乐意把未能播放的版本收录到DVD里。

2. KUNAL NAYYAR GOT HIRED BECAUSE HE WAS “CHARMING".2. 聘昆瑙·内亚就因为他很“迷人”。

In reminiscing about the early days, Prady explained how Raj came to be: “When we were casting for that part, we were casting for an international member of the ensemble.”回想起最初那段时间，布拉迪解释了缘何有拉杰这个角色，”我们在为那个角色选角时，我们想在全体中选出一个国际化的角色。“

3. AMY WAS MADE A NEUROSCIENTIST ON PURPOSE.3. 艾米是故意被设定成神经科学家的。

Mayim Bialik in real life has a PhD in neuroscience"In season four, Bill Prady said they’d make her what I am so I could fix things in the script if they were wrong,” she said.马伊姆·比亚利克在现实生活中有神经学博士文凭。”第四季里，比尔·布拉迪说要把她设置成我，这样如果剧本里有错误，我可以帮忙改正,“伊利亚克道。

4. PARSONS ATTRIBUTES THE SHOW'S SUCCESS TO ITS LACK OF CHARACTER ARCS.4. 帕森斯把成功归结于该剧的角色路线不变。

Parsons gave his theory on why The Big Bang Theory attracts over 20 million viewers a week. “People have so many choices on TV now, so no one’s asking for you to marry us. You can enjoy our show without a weekly appointment” .为何《生活大爆炸》一周会有超过两千万的电视观众，帕森斯有其自己的理论。”人们现在看电视的选择太多，没有人会要求你守着我们。你不用正儿八经每周来看。“

5. A NEW GENUS OF JELLYFISH IS NAMED BAZINGA.5. 有种水母被命名为BAZINGA。

In 2011, a photographer spotted the unnamed grape-sized rhizostome in Australia. In 2013, she named the jellyfish BAZINGA and published a paper on it .2011年，一个摄影家在澳大利亚发现了一个葡萄大小、未经命名的水母。2013年，她命名了这一水母，取名为”BAZINGA（谢耳朵的口头禅）“，并且就此发表了论文。

6. JIM PARSONS AND KALEY CUOCO-SWEETING ARE THE WORLD’S HIGHEST PAID TV ACTORS.6. 吉姆·帕森斯和卡蕾·库奥科-斯威廷是世界最高薪电视演员。

When Forbes released its annual list of the world's highest paid male TV actors, Jim Parsons landed on top with a gross of $29 million. Not to be outdone, Kaley Cuoco-Sweeting tops Forbes' list of highest paid actresses, with a grand total of $28.5 million.福布斯发布了年度世界最高薪电视男演员榜单，吉姆·帕森斯位居榜首，一揽2900万美元。卡蕾·库奥科-斯威廷也不逊色，位居福布斯最高薪酬女演员桂冠，赚得钵满盆满，统共收入2850万美元。

7. THE NEW SEASON WILL INTEGRATE THE NEW STAR WARS FILM.7. 新一季将结合新一部《星球大战》电影。

The Big Bang Theory's executive producer Steve Molarod said he’s not sure how he’s going to incorporate the upcoming film into the show, but that “it would be weird for us not to mention it.” 《生活大爆炸》执行制片人史蒂夫·莫罗德称，他也并不确定如何把即将上映的电影融入电视剧，但“避而不谈又未免显得奇怪”。
